entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 12:08 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
